text: we're pastors chaz and joni stevenson
and we're inviting you to houston faith
church come learn the bible it's god's
answer for your life come learn the
faith walk it's where you find peace and
joy and experience miracles come learn
their spirit filled life where the power
of the holy spirit is not so elusive but
becomes part of daily living at houston
faith we are committed to the lord jesus
his word and his spirit to the great
commission and to one another there is
more there's more of god for your life
